====Usage notes====
{{sense|military}} Under the [[w:National Revolutionary Army|National Revolutionary Army]], a regiment of [[infantry]] was composed of three [[battalion]]s ({{zh-l|*營}}) and some miscellaneous [[companies]] ({{zh-l|*連}}). In turn, two regiments formed a [[brigade]] ({{zh-l|*旅}}). Three regiments could be formed into a [[triangular division]], where the brigade structure was absent, as a [[division]] ({{zh-l|*整編師}} / {{zh-l|*編制師}}).
